channel.title: ENCOR on Cable Kitten
channel.description: Recent content in ENCOR on Cable Kitten

item.title: My ENCOR Journey
item.description: I passed my ENCOR just over a month ago. I took it on the last day of V1.0. Thought I’d give an overview of the resources I used and how I found things. Obviously the Exam has now changed, so other resources maybe required. Resources Core Books I would read every morning as soon as I woke. This way I guaranteed that I covered something everyday regardless of what got in the way.
